overview: Inspired by modernist painters like Kazimir Malevich, Leonardo da Vinci, and Auguste Rodin, this Ukrainian experimental short provides commentary on the short-lived nature of contemporary art. The film deranges the likeness of our culture's most treasured pieces of art, and, in doing so, is gorgeously framed and thought-provoking with a clever eye for the uncanny realizations of our favorite paintings.
title: S[Quare]D
